name: Golem Gets Gold
description:
Your wizard has abandoned you, fearless golem, unfortunately that means you are unfinished. You do not have enough energy to survive down there, you must escape to the sunlight to survive, keep your body hard with the wizards collected gold and stay alive enough with the energy holders he has laying around. But beware the monsters, they love gold, and will stop at nothing to take it from you. Good luck, fearless golem.

If you enjoyed the game, you can play as the wizard him self and battle monsters of unimaginable shapes and sizes in another game on my Itch.io page
